full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA LHA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI SNYING PO DNGOS GRUB KYI SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SGRUBS SNYING POR BYED PA BKA' CHEN YE SHES TSE RING GIS BLA MA MCHOD PA'I SNYING PO RGYUN DU KHA 'DON BYAS CHOG PA, LAM GYI GNAD KUN TSANG ZHING TSOGS TSEGS TSANG BA'I 'KHYER BDE 'DI LTA BU ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES YANG DANG YANG DU NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN PA, DPAL DPEN SA SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BRKA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DGA' LDAN BKA' RGYUD RIN PO CHE MAN NGAG ZAB MO'I 'DI DAG MI ZHUN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, MANGGA LAm, ,)
